name: Command Killer
description:
You're a hitman.

One shot to injure, a second shot to kill.

Just follow your instructions....

Made in 3 hours for Trijam #168.

Use mouse for control.

Uses Godot engine.

Credit:

Gabi for helping debug the (murder) logic
